verses.text_plain: Therefore, thou son of man, prophesy against Gog, and say, Thus saith the Lord God; Behold, I am against thee, O Gog, the chief prince of Meshech and Tubal:
verses.verse_html: 1Therefore, thou son of man, prophesy against Gog, and say, Thus saith the Lord God; Behold, I am against thee, O Gog, the chief prince of Meshech and Tubal:

verses.text_plain: And I will turn thee back, and leave but the sixth part of thee, and will cause thee to come up from the north parts, and will bring thee upon the mountains of Israel:
verses.verse_html:
2And I will turn thee back, and leave but the sixth part of thee, and will cause thee to come up from the north parts, and will bring thee upon the mountains of Israel: ▼
▼ leave…: or, strike thee with six plagues: or, draw thee back with an hook of six teeth
 , ▼
▼ the north…: Heb. the sides of the north

tokens.text: And I will turn thee back
and leave but the sixth part
of thee, and will cause thee to come up

footnotes.body_text: ▼ leave…: or, strike thee with six plagues: or, draw thee back with an hook of six teeth
footnotes.body_html: ▼ leave…: or, strike thee with six plagues: or, draw thee back with an hook of six teeth

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the north…: Heb. the sides of the north
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the north…: Heb. the sides of the north

verses.text_plain: And I will smite thy bow out of thy left hand, and will cause thine arrows to fall out of thy right hand.
verses.verse_html: 3And I will smite thy bow out of thy left hand, and will cause thine arrows to fall out of thy right hand.

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt fall upon the mountains of Israel, thou, and all thy bands, and the people that is with thee: I will give thee unto the ravenous birds of every sort, and to the beasts of the field to be devoured.
verses.verse_html:
4Thou shalt fall upon the mountains of Israel, thou, and all thy bands, and the people that is with thee: I will give thee unto the ravenous birds of every sort, and to the beasts of the field to be devoured. ▼
▼ sort: Heb. wing
 , ▼
▼ to be…: Heb. to devour

footnotes.body_html: ▼ to be…: Heb. to devour

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt fall upon the open field: for I have spoken it, saith the Lord God.
verses.verse_html:
5Thou shalt fall upon the open field: for I have spoken it, saith the Lord God. ▼
▼ the open…: Heb. the face of the field

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the open…: Heb. the face of the field
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the open…: Heb. the face of the field

verses.text_plain: And I will send a fire on Magog, and among them that dwell carelessly in the isles: and they shall know that I am the Lord.
verses.verse_html:
6And I will send a fire on Magog, and among them that dwell carelessly in the isles: and they shall know that I am the Lord. ▼
▼ carelessly: or, confidently

verses.text_plain: So will I make my holy name known in the midst of my people Israel; and I will not let them pollute my holy name any more: and the heathen shall know that I am the Lord, the Holy One in Israel.
verses.verse_html: 7So will I make my holy name known in the midst of my people Israel; and I will not let them pollute my holy name any more: and the heathen shall know that I am the Lord, the Holy One in Israel.

tokens.text: So will I make my holy

verses.text_plain: Behold, it is come, and it is done, saith the Lord God; this is the day whereof I have spoken.
verses.verse_html: 8Behold, it is come, and it is done, saith the Lord God; this is the day whereof I have spoken.

verses.text_plain: And they that dwell in the cities of Israel shall go forth, and shall set on fire and burn the weapons, both the shields and the bucklers, the bows and the arrows, and the handstaves, and the spears, and they shall burn them with fire seven years:
verses.verse_html:
9And they that dwell in the cities of Israel shall go forth, and shall set on fire and burn the weapons, both the shields and the bucklers, the bows and the arrows, and the handstaves, and the spears, and they shall burn them with fire seven years: ▼
▼ handstaves: or, javelins
 , ▼
▼ burn them…: or, make a fire of them

footnotes.body_text: ▼ burn them…: or, make a fire of them
footnotes.body_html: ▼ burn them…: or, make a fire of them

verses.text_plain: So that they shall take no wood out of the field, neither cut down any out of the forests; for they shall burn the weapons with fire: and they shall spoil those that spoiled them, and rob those that robbed them, saith the Lord God.
verses.verse_html: 10So that they shall take no wood out of the field, neither cut down any out of the forests; for they shall burn the weapons with fire: and they shall spoil those that spoiled them, and rob those that robbed them, saith the Lord God.

verses.text_plain: And it shall come to pass in that day, that I will give unto Gog a place there of graves in Israel, the valley of the passengers on the east of the sea: and it shall stop the noses of the passengers: and there shall they bury Gog and all his multitude: and they shall call it The valley of Hamon–gog.
verses.verse_html:
11And it shall come to pass in that day, that I will give unto Gog a place there of graves in Israel, the valley of the passengers on the east of the sea: and it shall stop the noses of the passengers: and there shall they bury Gog and all his multitude: and they shall call it The valley of Hamon–gog. ▼
▼ noses: or, mouths
 , ▼
▼ Hamon–gog: that is, The multitude of Gog

tokens.text: And it shall come to pass in that day

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Hamon–gog: that is, The multitude of Gog
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Hamon–gog: that is, The multitude of Gog

verses.text_plain: And seven months shall the house of Israel be burying of them, that they may cleanse the land.
verses.verse_html: 12And seven months shall the house of Israel be burying of them, that they may cleanse the land.

tokens.text: of them, that they may cleanse

verses.text_plain: Yea, all the people of the land shall bury them; and it shall be to them a renown the day that I shall be glorified, saith the Lord God.
verses.verse_html: 13Yea, all the people of the land shall bury them; and it shall be to them a renown the day that I shall be glorified, saith the Lord God.

tokens.text: and it shall be to them a renown

verses.text_plain: And they shall sever out men of continual employment, passing through the land to bury with the passengers those that remain upon the face of the earth, to cleanse it: after the end of seven months shall they search.
verses.verse_html:
14And they shall sever out men of continual employment, passing through the land to bury with the passengers those that remain upon the face of the earth, to cleanse it: after the end of seven months shall they search. ▼
▼ men…: Heb. men of continuance

footnotes.body_html: ▼ men…: Heb. men of continuance

verses.text_plain: And the passengers that pass through the land, when any seeth a man’s bone, then shall he set up a sign by it, till the buriers have buried it in the valley of Hamon–gog.
verses.verse_html:
15And the passengers that pass through the land, when any seeth a man’s bone, then shall he set up a sign by it, till the buriers have buried it in the valley of Hamon–gog. ▼
▼ set up: Heb. build

footnotes.body_html: ▼ set up: Heb. build

verses.text_plain: And also the name of the city shall be Hamonah. Thus shall they cleanse the land.
verses.verse_html:
16And also the name of the city shall be Hamonah. Thus shall they cleanse the land. ▼
▼ Hamonah: that is, The multitude

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Hamonah: that is, The multitude

verses.text_plain: And, thou son of man, thus saith the Lord God; Speak unto every feathered fowl, and to every beast of the field, Assemble yourselves, and come; gather yourselves on every side to my sacrifice that I do sacrifice for you, even a great sacrifice upon the mountains of Israel, that ye may eat flesh, and drink blood.
verses.verse_html:
17And, thou son of man, thus saith the Lord God; Speak unto every feathered fowl, and to every beast of the field, Assemble yourselves, and come; gather yourselves on every side to my sacrifice that I do sacrifice for you, even a great sacrifice upon the mountains of Israel, that ye may eat flesh, and drink blood. ▼
▼ unto…: Heb. to the fowl of every wing
 , ▼
▼ my sacrifice: or, my slaughter

footnotes.body_text: ▼ unto…: Heb. to the fowl of every wing
footnotes.body_html: ▼ unto…: Heb. to the fowl of every wing
▼ my sacrifice: or, my slaughter

verses.text_plain: Ye shall eat the flesh of the mighty, and drink the blood of the princes of the earth, of rams, of lambs, and of goats, of bullocks, all of them fatlings of Bashan.
verses.verse_html:
18Ye shall eat the flesh of the mighty, and drink the blood of the princes of the earth, of rams, of lambs, and of goats, of bullocks, all of them fatlings of Bashan. ▼
▼ goats: Heb. great goats

footnotes.body_html: ▼ goats: Heb. great goats

verses.text_plain: And ye shall eat fat till ye be full, and drink blood till ye be drunken, of my sacrifice which I have sacrificed for you.
verses.verse_html: 19And ye shall eat fat till ye be full, and drink blood till ye be drunken, of my sacrifice which I have sacrificed for you.

verses.text_plain: Thus ye shall be filled at my table with horses and chariots, with mighty men, and with all men of war, saith the Lord God.
verses.verse_html: 20Thus ye shall be filled at my table with horses and chariots, with mighty men, and with all men of war, saith the Lord God.

verses.text_plain: And I will set my glory among the heathen, and all the heathen shall see my judgment that I have executed, and my hand that I have laid upon them.
verses.verse_html: 21And I will set my glory among the heathen, and all the heathen shall see my judgment that I have executed, and my hand that I have laid upon them.

verses.text_plain: So the house of Israel shall know that I am the Lord their God from that day and forward.
verses.verse_html: 22So the house of Israel shall know that I am the Lord their God from that day and forward.

verses.text_plain: And the heathen shall know that the house of Israel went into captivity for their iniquity: because they trespassed against me, therefore hid I my face from them, and gave them into the hand of their enemies: so fell they all by the sword.
verses.verse_html: 23And the heathen shall know that the house of Israel went into captivity for their iniquity: because they trespassed against me, therefore hid I my face from them, and gave them into the hand of their enemies: so fell they all by the sword.

verses.text_plain: According to their uncleanness and according to their transgressions have I done unto them, and hid my face from them.
verses.verse_html: 24According to their uncleanness and according to their transgressions have I done unto them, and hid my face from them.

verses.text_plain: Therefore thus saith the Lord God; Now will I bring again the captivity of Jacob, and have mercy upon the whole house of Israel, and will be jealous for my holy name;
verses.verse_html: 25Therefore thus saith the Lord God; Now will I bring again the captivity of Jacob, and have mercy upon the whole house of Israel, and will be jealous for my holy name;

verses.text_plain: After that they have borne their shame, and all their trespasses whereby they have trespassed against me, when they dwelt safely in their land, and none made them afraid.
verses.verse_html: 26After that they have borne their shame, and all their trespasses whereby they have trespassed against me, when they dwelt safely in their land, and none made them afraid.

verses.text_plain: When I have brought them again from the people, and gathered them out of their enemies’ lands, and am sanctified in them in the sight of many nations;
verses.verse_html: 27When I have brought them again from the people, and gathered them out of their enemies’ lands, and am sanctified in them in the sight of many nations;

tokens.text: When I have brought them again

verses.text_plain: Then shall they know that I am the Lord their God, which caused them to be led into captivity among the heathen: but I have gathered them unto their own land, and have left none of them any more there.
verses.verse_html:
28Then shall they know that I am the Lord their God, which caused them to be led into captivity among the heathen: but I have gathered them unto their own land, and have left none of them any more there. ▼
▼ which…: Heb. by my causing of them, etc

tokens.text: which caused them to be led into captivity

footnotes.body_text: ▼ which…: Heb. by my causing of them, etc
footnotes.body_html: ▼ which…: Heb. by my causing of them, etc

verses.text_plain: Neither will I hide my face any more from them: for I have poured out my spirit upon the house of Israel, saith the Lord God.
verses.verse_html: 29Neither will I hide my face any more from them: for I have poured out my spirit upon the house of Israel, saith the Lord God.

tokens.text: any more from them: for I have poured out
